metadata.synopsis: As the player nears their final objective to escape the Nautiloid in the tutorial, Shadowheart calls out what they have to do - a transponder that needs to be reconnected at the front of the ship's helm

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: Keep going! Get to the transponder!
0.context: NodeContext: Urgent - one last effort so they can escape the crashing nautiloid
